section.name: Introduction
section.p: This document describes the process for launching Phoenix in the JBoss application server.

section.name: Procedure
section.p: Setup instructions (Windows based, but *nix equivalent is obvious):
Copy phoenix distribution to Jboss directory:
Copy phoenix loader to Jboss deployment dir (using Jboss 'default' server as example):
Copy phoenix loader config file to Jboss deployment dir (using Jboss 'default' server as example):
And don't forget to copy your app to the apps directory. I think that's everything - if I've forgotten anything just holler.
